title: Stop decrease AP item cost and total AP.
body:
Mid laners are not that poor.
We want more AP and stats, not cheaper and weaker items.
Only supports does.
Remember the days when AP items got 120 AP and {{item:3065}} only have 45 magic resist?

replies.body:
Remember when they increased the cost of AP items but didn't increase the AP on said items to compensate (and in fact reduced the AP on some because reasons)? Its nice of them to finally lower the prices back down to reasonable levels again, but because of that they have to further nerf the AP on those items obviously.

Sometimes I wonder what riot is smoking when they come up with these decisions.

Stat efficiency. AP items were always vastly more stat efficient compared to their AD counterparts. Old Zhonya's (Pre-preseason changes) cost 3200 gold. It's stat efficiency? 3900 without the active. Lower the AP, increase the cost, and it's about 85% cost efficient. Post 6.9 changes, Zhonyas will actually be about 90% gold efficient.

RoA right now - 105% gold efficient on purchase, 185% gold efficient when fully stacked,
RoA after the changes - 90% efficient on purchase, 160% gold efficient when fully stacked, not including it's unique passives.

All of the changes Riot is doing is trying to bring all AP items in line with each other while giving them distinct uses instead, This item boosts my damage in an arbitrary way. Or "This AP item is the most efficient, so that's what I buy, regardless of whether I need the passives or not."

Zhonya's will be fine, RoA will be fine, ALL THE AP ITEMS WILL BE FINE.

Remember when all those items where incredibly cheap compared to AD. compare old Hourglass, Deathcap, and DFG to Infinitey edge, BT and Mercurial Simitar in cost vs stats. 

Also remember when MR sucked ass which is why Riot had to buff it across the boards, since back in the day the only two viable MR items were BV and Spirit Visage.
They increased the costs of a lot of items at the start of the season because they were pumping a lot more gold in the game to compensate.

In case you didnt notice, AP got nerfed as the number of long-ranged AP champs go up. The rest of the AP are collateral damage.

The problem with long-ranged AP being, with massive attack range, there is virtually no interaction if they choose not to, unless you are an assassin. This leads to 3 things:
+ Mid lane now contain ONLY long-ranged mage and assassins. Mid-range AP have to relocate top/support/jungle. Teemo, Kennen, Swain, Vlad, Kayle, FIdd?
+ AP items cannot contribute too much dmg, as these long-ranged AP will start poking people back to fountain one by one and teamfight cannot start.
+ Mana has to stay expensive, to not allow the long-ranged AP to poke infinitely.

They experiment with the rocket belt to yield some leeway to mid-ranged AP but apparently pulled back. I'm not surprised if they go back to "Nerf AP value" approach.
